content.rendered: Hillevi Börjesson is a lawyer and Partner at Mannheimer Swartling. Hillevi is a part of the firm’s Real Estate practice group as well as the firm’s specialist group for company law. With more than 15 years as an active lawyer in the real estate industry, she has a extensive experience of buying and selling transactions (both direct transactions within real estate and corporate transactions), urban development, project development, real estate consortia/collaborations/joint ventures, property formation, construction matters, project and development issues (including planning and construction issues) as well as commercial tenancy and other usufruct. Hillevi regularly assist Swedish and international participants within the private and public sector in contract negotiations, government contacts, structural and corporate issues and she has a great experience of assignments for municipal activities and advice at a strategic level. Hillevi is ranked as a leading advisor within Real Estate Law by international ranking institutes such as Chambers Europe, and has been described by clients as ”a highly skilled lawyer with good negotiation skills and an incredible eye for detail” and ”she particularly excels in long and complex project development matters”.
